row.item_desc: Enter the url that the logo is linked to

row.item_options: left top,left center,left bottom,right top,right center,right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom

row.item_desc: Choosing "Custom" allows you to change the colors of the theme.
row.item_options: Agency, Fashion, Real Estate, Restaurant, Custom

row.item_desc: If you want the following colors on the theme choose "Custom" from above field.

row.item_title: Theme Custom - enable grid on menu & lists
Theme Custom - enable grid on page header

row.item_desc: Leave empty it you don't want to display any message

row.item_title: Enter the name of the menu - for offline theme
row.item_desc: just in case you want to use a theme switcher plugin

row.item_title: Enter the content of the Front page - for offline theme
row.item_desc: leave empty to display default Front page content
Select true if you don't want your images cropped
milliseconds between the end of the sliding effect and the start of the nex one
length of the sliding effect in milliseconds
Upload your social media icons here.
